name: Deshboard
description: A dashboard full of tools for help developers to get a grateful work day, or night =).
content_security_policy: default-src 'unsafe-eval' 'self' https://*.firebaseio.com/; connect-src http://www.bing.com/ wss://*.firebaseio.com/; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com/ https://fonts.googleapis.com https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.googleapis.com https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com; script-src 'unsafe-eval' 'self' https://*.firebaseio.com/ https://*.googleapis.com/; img-src http://www.bing.com
